jobDescription: Job DescriptionLeadStack Inc. is an award winning, one of the nation's fastest growing, certified minority owned (MBE) staffing services provider of contingent workforce. As a recognized industry leader in contingent workforce solutions and Certified as a Great Place to Work, we're proud to partner with some of the most admired Fortune 500 brands in the world. Title: Senior Data Engineer Location: Preferred location Cincinnati OH but also Remote for any location (100% Remote)Duration: 9 monthsJob ID: 24-00431 Top 3 skills needed: Databricks, PySpark/python and SQL. Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Data Engineer to join our team in building a cutting-edge data platform for the warehouse and manufacturing domains within the *** supply chain space. As a Senior Data Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing data pipelines to handle terabytes of data in Azure cloud environments. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to architect scalable data solutions using Azure Databricks, Cosmos DB, Synapse Analytics, and SQL Hyperscale. The ideal candidate for the Data Engineer role will possess strong technical proficiency in a variety of tools and technologies relevant to data engineering in Azure cloud environments. This includes demonstrated expertise in Azure Databricks for building and optimizing data pipelines, as well as experience with Azure Synapse Analytics for data warehousing and analytics. Proficiency in SQL is essential for querying and manipulating data within these platforms, along with programming skills in Python and PySpark for data processing and transformation tasks. Additionally, the candidate should have experience working with distributed computing frameworks and familiarity with cloud-based storage solutions such as Azure Blob Storage and Azure Data Lake Storage. Knowledge of data modeling, ETL processes, and data security best practices is also crucial for designing and implementing scalable and reliable data solutions. The ability to troubleshoot and optimize data processing workflows, along with strong problem-solving skills, is essential for ensuring the performance and efficiency of data pipelines in high-throughput environments. Key Responsibilities: Design and implement robust data pipelines for high-throughput data ingestion, transformation, and storage.Optimize data processing workflows for performance and scalability in Azure cloud environments.Collaborate with data scientists and business analysts to understand requirements and deliver data engineering solutions that meet business objectives.Ensure data consistency, reliability, and security in distributed data processing environments.Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline failures, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum reliability.Refine RequirementsDesign and
